1.0.0.name: wordpress/archives-by-woothemes
1.0.0.description:
"Archive by WooThemes" is a collection of archive functions for WordPress. Use us to display archives of your content in "Timeline" or "Sitemap" format, using either a shortcode, action or template tag.

Looking for a helping hand? View plugin documentation.

Looking to contribute code to this plugin? Fork the repository over at GitHub. (submit pull requests to the latest "release-" branch)
